description: A pair of swimming trunks, with netting.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A neoprene hood, commonly worn by divers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A customized armored neoprene and Kevlar hood, very strong and durable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A lightweight, hand-built combination armor made from a cut-down bulletproof vest and a reinforced neoprene wetsuit.  Protects from the elements as well as from harm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

description: A pair of customized, Kevlar armored neoprene gloves, modified to be easy to wear while providing maximum protection under extreme conditions.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A long-sleeved spring wetsuit with pink color details and cleavage-enhancing, hip-accentuating construction.  Not as protective as a full-body suit, but also less restrictive.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A one piece chainmail suit used by scuba divers for protection against shark bites.  It has been conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A one piece chainmail suit used by scuba divers for protection against shark bites.  It comes with attached plastic helmet and booties.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A small pair of goggles made for swimming.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of very flexible neoprene-silicone rubber gloves, suitable for underwater use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
